dain saint art and activism for an abundant society
about follow projects support

arrogance
is thinking you
can’t lose

confidence
is knowing you
can win

self-esteem
is knowing your value even if you
don’t play

temet nosce

part of the book of words

well of course
i'm full of myself

who else,
exactly,
am i supposed
to be full of?
